snippet.title: YO-KAI WATCH™ 3 - Two heroes, one big Yo-kai adventure! (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Join Nate as he travels to St. Peanutsburg for a brand new adventure in YO-KAI WATCH 3, coming to Nintendo 3DS family systems on 7/12! 

Enjoy new grid-based battles, befriend over 600 different Yo-kai, and meet Hailey Anne – Springdale’s newest hero! 

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/user/NintendoUKofficial/?sub_confirmation=1

► Facebook Nintendo 3DS family systems: https://facebook.com/Nintendo3DSuk
► Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
► Instagram Nintendo UK: https://instagram.com/NintendoUK

#YOKAIWATCH #3DS
